Class FESI.Exceptions.EcmaScriptException 

FESI.Exceptions.EcmaScriptException
public class EcmaScriptException
Superclass of all common exceptions used by the FESI system

eol
The end of line string for this machine.
evaluationSources
The list of EcmaScript evaluation sources at this error

EcmaScriptException(String)
Create a generic exception with cause "reason"
EcmaScriptException(String, Throwable)
Create a generic exception with cause "reason", originially caused by the originatingException

appendEvaluationSource(EvaluationSource)
Append an evaluation source to the list of evaluation sources
getLineNumber()
Get the line number of the error if possible
getMessage()
Display the message, the originating exception and the EmcaScript callback chain.
getOriginatingException()
Get the originating exception (if any) or null
isIncomplete()
If true would the the parser error detected when a statement is incomplete.
printStackTrace()
Prints this Throwable and its backtrace to the standard error stream.
printStackTrace(PrintStream)
Prints this Throwable and its backtrace to the specified print stream.
printStackTrace(PrintWriter)
Prints this Throwable and its backtrace to the specified print writer.

eol 
 protected static String eol
The end of line string for this machine.

evaluationSources 
 protected Vector evaluationSources
The list of EcmaScript evaluation sources at this error

EcmaScriptException 
 public EcmaScriptException(String reason)
Create a generic exception with cause "reason"

Parameters:
reason - the reason of the exception
EcmaScriptException 
 public EcmaScriptException(String reason,
                            Throwable originatingException)
Create a generic exception with cause "reason", originially caused by the originatingException

Parameters:
reason - the reason of the exception
originatingException - the original exception creating this exception

getOriginatingException 
 public Throwable getOriginatingException()
Get the originating exception (if any) or null

Returns:
originating exception or null.
appendEvaluationSource 
 public void appendEvaluationSource(EvaluationSource es)
Append an evaluation source to the list of evaluation sources

Parameters:
es - The evaluation source to add
getLineNumber 
 public int getLineNumber()
Get the line number of the error if possible

getMessage 
 public String getMessage()
Display the message, the originating exception and the EmcaScript callback chain.

If cause by another exception displays its callback chain

isIncomplete 
 public boolean isIncomplete()
If true would the the parser error detected when a statement is incomplete.

printStackTrace 
 public void printStackTrace()
Prints this Throwable and its backtrace to the standard error stream.

printStackTrace 
 public void printStackTrace(PrintStream s)
Prints this Throwable and its backtrace to the specified print stream.

printStackTrace 
 public void printStackTrace(PrintWriter w)
Prints this Throwable and its backtrace to the specified print writer.
